FirstPage.YourWeather: Meow weather, meow at paw! Don't let the meow surprise you. Let's purr!

Sunny.1: Put on your sunnypaws, you shine brighter than Edward Catlen in the sun!
Sunny.2: It's so nice out, we could film an episode of *Furriends* on the beach.
Sunny.3: The sun is out, even Supercat is taking advantage to recharge his whiskers.

Cloudy.1: What?! The sun is hidden! Is it the meowther ship from *Independence Day*?
Cloudy.2: It's so cloudy that even Gandpurr isn't as grey.
Cloudy.3: Grey sky? It looks like the beginning of a Tim Purrton movie.

Rainy.1: It's raining, it's pouring, don't forget your magical umbrella like Mary Purrppins!
Rainy.2: Think of your rubber paws, you're ready for a *Jurassic Purrk* adventure.
Rainy.3: I'M SINGING IN THE RAIN JUST SINGING IN THE RAIN

Stormy.1: Watch out, Thorpaw is out with his hammer today!
Stormy.2: Watch out, Zeus is doing clay pigeon shooting today!
Stormy.3: The storm is coming, it's not recommended to fly a kite.

Snowy.1: The snow is falling like someone opened the wardrobe door to Narnia.
Snowy.2: It's time to build a snowcat, Olaf will be jealous!
Snowy.3: Snow! Elsa is singing 'Let It Go' again.

Windy.1: It's blowing hard, like when you stood in front of the fan as a kitten.
Windy.2: There's too much wind today, no need to groom your fur.
Windy.3: Strong winds today, it's not recommended to play Quidditch.

Foggy.1: It's so foggy we could film an episode of *Sherlock*.
Foggy.2: Thick fog? Perfect for a *Scooby-Doo* mystery.

Heatwave.2: Extreme heat: it's not even this hot on Arrakis in *Dune*.
Heatwave.3: The sun is playing the barbecue card to the max, stay in the shade to avoid ending up like Anakin on Mustafar.

Frost.1: It's cold, Elsa is singing 'Let It Go' again.
Frost.2: Freezing weather: perfect for a cozy day in!
Frost.3: With this cold, it's like you're in The Day After Tomorrow.

Localisation.SelectedCityDefault: The selected city will be displayed by default when you open your space.
